radial_intensity#

eosdxanalysis.preprocessing.utils.radial_intensity(image, center=None, radius=None, azimuthal_point_count=360, start_angle=None, end_angle=None, res=1)#

Performs 2D -> 1D radial intensity summation yielding total intensity as a function of radius.

Parameters:

  • image (ndarray) – Diffraction image.

  • center ((num, num)) – Center of diffraction pattern.

  • radius (int) –

  • azimuthal_point_count (int) – Number of points in azimuthal dimension.

  • start_angle (float) – Radians

  • end_angle (float) – Radians

  • res (int) – Resolution

Returns:

profile_1d – n = azimuthal_point_count

Return type:

(n,1)-array float
